website_summaries.verdict: While is works well in most cases for feeding and monitoring your pet from a distance, customer support may be lacking if you run into any operational issues.
pros: Generates enthusiasm among owners who appreciate the accurate feeding measurements and like how well the webcam and 2-way audio works
Holds a generous portion of food
cons: Checking your WiFi first is helpful to avoid issues, as some phone and connectivity problems have been noted
Larger kibble may clog the dispenser

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 2.5 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchases this on Feb. 28 2018 and it just stopped working. The motor no longer turns and I tried seeing if it was just stuck, jammed, etc. but that is not the case. Motor is just done. I would not buy this product I guess you get what you pay for. Now I have to buy another one but will go ahead and see what the higher price ones are like.
customer_reviews.author: DMV_P

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT YOUR DOG WILL STARVE!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on 3/12 I placed brand new batteries in and it worked fine for a few days. On 3/18 I got home and noticed it had reset and had not fed my 8-week old puppy the entire day!! All settings had strangely been reset to manufacture settings. I reset settings and it worked for one more day and said LOW battery! And did not feed my dog AGAIN!! There is no way batteries would have died so quickly!! I will be returning!! NOT A RELIABLE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a cat. Tried both the late and small feeders and it occasionally dispensed 1 dry food pellet at a time. The design is flawed, food was pushed into the hopper rather than down the chute. Then trying to declog it this happened... Update: 9 months have passed since returning this item and writing this review, yet the seller continues to repeatedly contact me requesting that I delete this review for a $20 AMZ gift card. I stand by this review.
customer_reviews.author: NAncy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this pet feeder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pet feeder. It is very well made and the dish good sized and straight forward on programming pet meals and meal size is easy to adjust bigger or smaller. My only fault is that it is only 4 day capacity. But otherwise it is a gem. I previously purchased a different pet feeder from Amazon which was about a $100 more! It was very complicated to program and never operated the way it was said that it would. I finally sent it back and waited 4 months to buy this one primarily based on customers ratings. I recommend this feeder. It's a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Puma

customer_reviews.title: time keeping mechanism was defective, not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to feed my two cats. I was delighted at first . Then I realized that the feeder defaulted during the day to the incorrect time, so my cats were not being fed at the desired time they were being fed at odd hours. I still had to be around to feed them because the feeder couldn't adhere to the desired time schedule. I liked the fact that they would hear my voice when I was away, but I couldn't rely upon it to feed my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: No match for a smart dog
customer_reviews.text: It took our Australian Sheppard a week to figure out how to break in and rob it.
customer_reviews.author: TCK

customer_reviews.title: doesn't dispense food automatically
customer_reviews.text: i set the food to dispense for my dog's dinner, making sure that i had the right mechanism for the size of my dog's food. i set up a tester time just to make sure it worked, and low and behold it did not. i thought that it might be a problem with the food size, so i checked to make sure it would dispense the food at all. when i held down the manual button, the food did release, so i am not sure why the food won't dispense at the times i have set. i have restarted it and reset the feeding times multiple times, but to no avail. i'm very disappointed in the performance of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars if the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if the instructions had been clearer and more in depth. They should let the buyer know there is a u-tube video to instruct. Also portion conversions. ie: the large hopper needs 4 portions to make 1/2 cup, their email response was "2 large portions make 1/2 cup". Still testing unit..
customer_reviews.author: lynnsnotes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Serving size is 1/8 cup but has the option to change the wheel to allow for smaller servings. (Included in package) I bought this one to replace another item I bought on Amazon that never worked straight out of the box. I like that you can easily adjust times/feeding portions for a specific feeding or turn it off/on. The sound of the recording isn't that loud but it's pretty unneccessary since the food comes out first anyway and the cats have no trouble hearing that. So far the cats have not been able to open the feeder or tip it over. I would definitely recommend this product if you want to keep your cats on a schedule.
customer_reviews.author: eduardotorres500

customer_reviews.title: Get something else, they keep begging for better review via email
customer_reviews.text: No video on how to set up anywhere. Instructions are absolutely terrible. Phone number is to god knows where. I couldn’t get a hold of anyone using phone number. Just ridiculous. I decided to return it, but i kept getting endless emails from the company begging me to change my review, which made me wonder how many people fall for It out of pity.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Arce

customer_reviews.title: Portions are consistently inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried two different types of dry food and the portions are way off and inaccurate. It dumps out at least 1.5 cups when I set it to 1⁄2 a cup, and at 3⁄4 a cup, it dumps out more than 3 cups. On more than a dozen occasions I had to watch a mountain of cat food being dumped out the machine (I have a wifi camera so I can watch the device go into action). Sadly, I am now resorting to setting this to 1⁄4 a cup multiple times a day. The only good thing about this feeder is that the wi-fi commands/work. But the portion control is not accurate at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the lazy pet owner
customer_reviews.text: this is what I was looking for. it works. once you get the right amount of food adjusted it is just pour some food in every couple of weeks and that's it. I have 2 cats and only bad thing is they freak out and go crazy run for it when the food comes out. I love that you can record a message to your pet. it works even if the power goes off for a while. this is worth the price and I don't spend money on stuff like this but im soooo glad I did. You know your lazy so get this and be a bit lazier.
customer_reviews.author: Vonroper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome auto feeder.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is overweight. I would feed her in the morning and find out later she would eat all the food and ask for more from another family member while I was gone. NOT ANYMORE! This feeder performs as advertised and now the guessing game is over. I set it to feed her before I get up and she doesn't wake me up demanding food like she did previously. I like that the feeder refills easily and has both wall and battery power sources. It's also nice to know she won't overeat over the weekend if we leave.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Overall good with some manageable flaws
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the Wopet feeder for about two years now and I’m happy with it for my cats. It’s allowed me freedom to go out for a few days and watch them through my camera. It’s never failed to produce the portions. It was tough at first to know how many portions were needed and which turnstile I needed to use to get the right portion size. I just ended up measuring it myself. Lastly, the kibble does not slide down the tray. It gets backed up. My cats learned how to grab the kibble, but awkward at times watching them. Maybe that’s on purpose so it doesn’t overflow? No biggie overall. They learned to deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution for our House
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several weeks ago to replace an old feeder that required a refill every 3 days. This is great, probably just a once a week will be my plan, but I think it would go several weeks providing twice-daily feeding for our two cats. Easy to program and adjust, best feature is the lockable lid and the wide range of quantity control. It has 39 settings, you're bound to find the best choice for your pet(s). We replaced the long usb cord with a much shorter cable as ours is very near an outlet under the side table in the dining room. So far, this unit is really outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: AZBuckeyeRacer

customer_reviews.title: Features make it worth the price
customer_reviews.text: More reliable than battery operated. Holds lots of food if you had to be away for a while. I use a feeder all the time because my girls will wake me up when we don't use the automatic feeder. Best part is that it's secure. With the old one, I had to rig an ever-more-elaborate protection to keep Rita from stealing food. She can't reach her paw up into this one, and she can't open the lid unless she grows an opposable thumb. Plus, it's more attractive than the last. So all in all, it's worth the price for us.
customer_reviews.author: sprosser

customer_reviews.title: Works good with slight adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Having a large dog has given me a differing opinion than others I read. It takes 24 servings to make one feeding and it is difficult for our dog to get his food. Think I’ve helped that in putting the feeder up on a platform so he won’t have to turn his head to the side to eat. Usually feed him once a day but because it takes a while for feeder to dispense 24 servings, I have begun to feed him twice a day. Thinking that will work better. The primary reason for this purchase is to be able to feed the dog when we’re gone overnight and that is working good for us.
customer_reviews.author: leeny

customer_reviews.title: All parts hand wash only
customer_reviews.text: All parts are hand wash only, really a pain to take apart to clean all parts. Dispenses proper amount if you measure it out initially to the amount your pet requires. I only dispense 1/4 for each feeding; about half of it falls directly under the shoot requiring my kitty to use her paw to bring it out where she can reach it and eat it. Would be nice if bowl were tilted so the food would slide down or have it dispense with a little more force to push the food out further. Definitely recommend putting in batteries in addition to using the adapter. Pretty easy to program. Day #2, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: loverson

customer_reviews.title: BWAHAHAHAHA!!! We get a show three times a day when the whirring (motor) starts up.
customer_reviews.text: We have a rather demanding feline when it comes to food, so we purchased this auto-feeder. Now, instead of yowling and glaring at us an hour before feeding time, the cat sits and glares at the machine. On those occasions she is elsewhere in the house, when the motor starts whirring to dispense the food, the cat looks like a black streak out of a Tom & Jerry cartoon tearing down the stairs to get to the feeder. Almost as good of entertainment as the old bugzappers and a six-pack of beer.
customer_reviews.author: jdkinman

customer_reviews.title: Where Have These Been My Whole Life!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! No longer do my cats wake me up in the morning asking for breakfast. The programmable feeder is absolutely worth the money. You can set breakfast, snack time, and dinner ... up to four meals each different portion sizes and even program your voice! we went away on a seven day vacation and these feeders worked absolutely perfectly. We had our friends come in twice just to check on them and play with them but they absolutely were fed because we came home they were a little chunky. We added a snack time while we were away as a treat! But in all seriousness I would absolutely buy again. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and set it up about a week ago. It does work and our dog gets excited, but the only thing I don't like is how quiet the speaker is. We bought it hoping that our dog would be able to hear it from upstairs to be fed in the morning without waking us up. It is a quiet speaker, so I am not sure if he hears it, or if he just wanders down there around 5:30am looking for food. Either way, it is helping with us not having to get up to feed our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Follow up
customer_reviews.text: One of the best auto feeders I have purchased over the years, easy programming, only downfall I wish it held a little bit more food, I have to refill it every 10 days with us feeding a 1 1/2 cups per day mini size. I contacted seller in Feb. 2019 that Unit has failed in the controller. I was told a replacement would be coming and I am still waiting for product, I have contacted seller 4 times since 3/15/19 with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Jann

customer_reviews.title: Feeding your pet the easy way!
customer_reviews.text: I used this automatic pet feeder for my cat and tell you what it saved me big time! I was waking up every morning at 4am because my cat was constantly biting my toes and me because he was hungry. So I got this device and set it up every morning at 4am for his breakfast and 6:30pm for his lunch! What's great about this product is that you can record your voice saying breakfast time! or dinner! and they come running while the feeder automatically dispenses food. Additionally, you can set specific portion sizes for each meal and this one is big enough to feed large dogs! Overall, great product highly recommended for cats or dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I am no longer a slave to the cats
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to get an automatic pet feeder. I am gradually training my two cats to bother the feeder, not me, when mealtime comes around. I've had this feeder for a couple of months and so far it has functioned flawlessly. The programming wasn't too difficult. I programmed a morning and evening meal. I did forget to put backup batteries in initially so when we lost power, I had to dispense manually and also reprogram. The food reservoir is big enough to last about a week or maybe a little more for feeding two adult cats. My biggest concern is ongoing reliability, but I haven't had it for long enough to comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey K

customer_reviews.title: I Can Finally Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 cats who are absolutely insistent about being fed first thing in the morning (usually around 5:45). I used to just go to work early and miserable, but now I can finally sleep. This feeds them early in the morning and now they don't even bother me. It's like they don't even need me any more. They don't even bother getting out of bed. It's like they know there will always be food so they aren't even worried about it. Anyway, this is great for your sanity. If you're scooping food into their bowl 4 times a day, GET THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working but Replacement Provided
customer_reviews.text: Regrettably, it just stopped working after less than a month. I can dispense manually, but it didn’t dispense any food over 3 different times overnight and this morning. I called Wopet customer service and they immediately sent me a replacement unit. I am impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I posted an unboxing video because the packaging was very professional and really showed they cared about getting it to the customer without any damage so that was the first positive thing I noticed. after opening I was surprised with the size of it. you wouldn't think by the look of it that it would fit a whole 7 pound bag of dog food but it did with a little room to spare! this will be a great product to keep my dog on a more scheduled eating pattern! (she's getting a little chunky)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: BPA free?  No extra tray to wash and switch out
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to program Design is OK Holds the perfect amount for a smallish dog or 2-3 cats Portions are good Easy to clean Cons: Not confirmed to be BPA free No way to buy an extra food tray so it is really annoying to remove the tray with food bits. I could not find anyway to buy a second tray so one could be in the wash Wish the opening was higher up so you could use your own steel bowls or even plates
customer_reviews.author: BuffPuff

customer_reviews.title: Good, but can use some redesigns for ease of use and protections against failures
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, it is required to set multiple servings due to small size of well, serving portions. The item does have a tendency to fall over if placed on carpet or other squishy surfaces. Cleaning is ok, I had to take off the lock lid to clean part of the item because somehow a pice of food got in the rotator area. The plug should be dishonesties with a locking function because cats (at lease mine) like to lay on wires which in this case unplugs the item, needing a Complete reconfiguring of settings unless you have batteries in it. Overall good product, could use some redesign features
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design [Updated]
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known of its faults before the return window expired... My small cats easily knocked the unit over while I was away which rendered it useless. Fortunately, I had a second capable of feeding them both for a short duration. Another negative is that food in the dispenser is exposed at all times. The opening is too small for the cats to bypass, although ants had no trouble locating and entering the unit. -- Update -- The seller was quick to reach out after my bad experience, and they were very willing to rectify the situation. I would definitely be willing to try their other products in the future given the excellent customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S. Mcpeters

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good with just two small issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this product and it’s done what I wanted it to do. I just have to small issues with it. One, it is loud when dispensing food. I got it partly so my cats would stop waking me up so early to eat and now the machine wakes me up. Haha. The other complaint is I’m feeding 4 cats so I have the portion setting on like 11, but when dispensing it blocks the entire amount from coming out into the dish because it stays at the opening. It needs a slant or something so the food moves further down into the dish to allow the entire portion to come out. Otherwise I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be difficult to set up but this thing is very easy to program. I have changed the feeding times several times now and have added and removed scheduled meals and it is very easy to do. My cat recognizes the sound of food pouring out so I didn't bother recording anything to play each time. (Pretty sure I don't want to hear my own voice recorded and played several times a day, every day). Cat still nags for food though. I had hoped this would stop him from nagging first thing in the morning. Portions seem to be very accurate based on the time or 2 I measured what came out.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H.

customer_reviews.title: Ants are a problem, Capacity on the small side
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this thing, now not so much. Basic problems are: 1) Ants - the top does not seal so once the ants find it, the food reservoir will be full of them. 2) Ants - typically a couple pieces of kibble will get stuck up in the mechanism / top of the chute. Even if the top did seal, the ants will still find those few pieces. 3) Capacity is a bit on the small side for a large dog. Need to refill every 4 - 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: H.F. Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lazy cat owner or person who can’t always be at the house!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It helps a lot when I’m working or out of town, and I don’t have to worry about over feeding the cat. I’ve been using it for over a year with no issues. The speaker volume is low and distorted, but I don’t care. It’s a feature I myself and my cat doesn’t need as he can hear the mechanism just fine and knows when it’s time for feeding. I enjoy seeing him run towards it whenever it’s feeding time. He’s cleaver and has figured out if he shakes the unit a little he can get a couple more kibbles out before it stops. He has never managed to tip it over.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am surprisingly really pleased with this feeder. It is pretty quiet. You can put a ton of food in it and basically forget about it. I have it feed my cat 4 tiny meals a day. Sheused to be so food obsessed would just sit by her food dish and scream and swat. Now she doesn't associate food with me anymore. No more screaming. She seems very happy. I like that it has batteries and a power cord. Cons: the instructions are a lot. Almost too many options
customer_reviews.author: MollyRDH

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser is great - until it clogs
customer_reviews.text: This food dispenser was such a game changer for me! Really loved it initially and allowed me to stay later at the office without worrying about my cat. However, it clogs very quickly and it is hard to tell. My cat has gone almost 2 days without food before I realized that the feeder wasn’t working. The issue is that the kibbles jam in the rotating piece which prevent is from rotating our more food. When it happens, I have to take everything apart and clean it - which isn’t that bad. However it’s beginning to happen on a biweekly basis which is very stressful! I wish it had some sort of alarm for when it was clogged.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works great, combined with a UPS for power interruption immunity
customer_reviews.text: Have a 70 lb chocolate lab. I use this to feed her 2x per day on large dispenser portion setting "8" for both breakfast and dinner. Had it set on 10 and that was a little too much. She is an outside dog, but largely sedentary. I also ordered the following UPS  so I could have it run for over a week if necessary and not depend on power. With portions set on 8, 2x per day it looks like a full bin lasts about 7-8 days. I did install the D cell batteries in the unit, but really rely on the UPS as a more dependable and far greater capacity backup.
customer_reviews.author: StephenH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Love this feeder!
customer_reviews.text: We have dogs that kept eating all the cats food so we moved the cats upstairs and used a baby gate to block off the stairs. Well, we’re kind of lazy and only have our kids every other week. This leaves a whole week of having to go upstairs to feed the cats. Ugh! Enter the automatic pet feeder. This is so amazing! My cats love it and so do we! It has two different food portion wheels for smaller portions and larger portions. I’ve been using the small portion at 6 portions at each feeding. With my piggy cats I may need to change to the larger portion feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Candace K

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for those with busy lives!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I invested in this automatic dog feeder! So many great features including the ability to control portion, auto feeding time are always on time (I personally set it for breakfast and dinner), it stores almost a month worth of food so it’s quite large and it’s removable so it’s super easy to clean. Also, there’s a lock on the top of the feeder so even if it were to be knocked over or my dog tries to open, it is secure and requires you to press a button to open the lid. Build is sturdy and looks modern and sleek. Definitely going to purchase a second for my other dog!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Super great design and awesome for when you’re away!
customer_reviews.text: So far we LOVE this feeder. It’s absolutely wonderful for when you have to travel. Plus I love the playback feature! Super cute idea. We were away for a week and my friend didn’t even need to refill our feeder for our 3 cats. Super awesome! I love that it also have scheduled meal times and you can adjust the serving amount. After reading the instructions, it’s super user friendly. Plus, I like that it has an option for battery usage if you don’t want to plug it in. Personally, I love that it is always running and I don’t have to worry about batteries dying. So far, this was an AWESOME buy and I’m so glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Needs assembly if you have a cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat destroys automatic feeders by shredding the wheel that dispenses food in most models. This feeder works the same way, so it's days are numbered. The biggest issue I have with this model is you need to disassemble it to set it up for small pets. It took about 30 minutes to remove the large pet food wheel thi g and put the cat sized one on. Hopefully it takes lo her for my cat to figure out how to trash this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep on top of pups food. Very nice looking and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: This has been hilarious to watch my pup get used to this! I tried the voice recording but that REALLY freaked her out! But it’s been really nice to not have to think about if she’s been fed or not! This comes very well wrapped, it’s not cheaply made and it holds 20 cups of my dogs food. Can’t remember if this was in the description or not, but be aware that the time is set to military time, so i had to figure that out. But it was really easy to set up after that. You will have to play around with the “dosage” of food. For me, 5 doses equals about 1/2 cup, so start there.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we have some land and another house. We have cats at our land and if we leave out food the raccoons and other wild animals eat it. I bought this and a lockable container and made a raccoon proof feeder that we can leave for the cats. After one day it is working great. Of course the wild animals eat what is left in the bowl but that is ok because we know it will drop more food in the morning for the cats. We are running it off batteries so I don’t know how long they will last. But so far this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good if you buy it on sale
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple times of rereading the instructions before I was able to program it, but overall it goes together relatively easily. You'll need a screwdriver if you want to change to the smaller size food dispenser though. It does take some hit and miss to figure out exactly how many units your pet needs, I wish there was a conversion chart someplace. While the food does dispense toward the back of the bowl as some reviewers have noticed, most cats are able to scoop it towards the front. Mine had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dier

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: One of my two cats had a weight problem that was causing problems for her health and her ability to clean herself. This item is awesome! Fatty-McFadden has lost almost 3lbs over several months of using this controlled-portion feeder. She looks like a super model now and is so much healthier without my need to monitor intake every day. I love it and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa a.

customer_reviews.title: Works with limitations
customer_reviews.text: Machine works well but the portion size is limited because there is very little “drop”. Setting it above a 5 is pretty much equivalent to a 5 because the food blocks the exit so no new food will exit the machine until your pet eats what is blocking it. For a single animal this is fine but I have 3 cats. I’ve gotten around this by setting more feedings and hoping that the same cat doesn’t collect at every feeding. It is fine for vacation but I wouldn’t use it for everyday use. Also, the recording of “here kitty kitty” Just sounds like chirping to me. It has its intended result but it’s worthy of 3 stars, not 5.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: wonderful until stopped working less than a year after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with this although it was a bit complicated. Fed my cats 3 x a day and they didn't bug me in the morning, so I could sleep a bit past 5 am. The problem is that it simply stopped functioning and I have no idea why. First it seemed sluggish, and missed some feedings. Then it didn't work at all. Bought Oct 20191, stopped working my June 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Matisse54

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Attentive Customer Service and Great Timed Feeder
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable and extremely attentive customer service. I bought this last year, really loving it and a few months ago it failed me. I wrote the company because I am going out of town and desperately need timed feeder. They replied in less than a day and will be sending a replacement. My cat needs to be on a diet to avoid diabetes. I use the smallest setting 2 x daily. Veterinarian is very happy with the health of my cat. I highly recommend this product. And, don't hesitate as I did to contact them with any issues. Their response is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great for Anyone with an Active Life or Who Likes to Sleep In
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It has been a game changer for me and my little fur ball. I love that I can go visit my parents over night and not have to worry about my cat being fed! It has also made a huge impact on my relationship with my cat. He used to wake me up every morning by meowing, pawing my face and just being a nuisance until I fed him. Now, he knows that his food doesn’t come from me and bothering me won’t get him anything. He stopped! I get to sleep in now and enjoy my mornings and he’s happy because he gets fed before I even wake up!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder!
customer_reviews.text: Great all around feeder. Puppy got used to it very quickly and now it’s our main way of feeding. Setup was quick and simple except for the feeding size. I had to play with that for a while to figure out the right portion size, because it is not on a cups or oz, it’s hard to figure out. I got this on sale and decided to go with this one instead of the one with the camera, mainly because I can get a smart camera for $20 and place it wherever I want to get a better view, with the same, if not, better features!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This feeder saved me. Switching my car into a diet was rough on my sleep. My cat would wake me up in the middle of the night to feed him every day. With this the cat gets just enough food and he’s realized that I don’t physically feed him in the morning. It holds enough cat food for weeks which is also nice. The lock takes two hands to open usually making it impossible for the cats to figure out. Additionally it’s large and heavy enough that they haven’t been able to knock it over to get the food out. It’s easy to program, works consistently. I could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our cat when we go away for weekend trips. There are many different options to adjust the portion size and you can select up to 4 feedings per day. We like the battery back-up option in case the power goes out or our cat unplugs it. The top where you load the food locks securely and food will not come out if the feeder is tipped or the cat sticks their paw up into it (unlike previous feeders we’ve had). Overall very satisfied and it’s worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: SzalkowC

customer_reviews.title: good option, reliable enough
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good buy. The storage is great and hard for the cat to open. The timing settings are well welcomed, and really make things easy. I strongly encourage upping the feeding portion to two or three unless you want to do for meals a day. My main problems are that the recording is soft and mumbled, and that the bowl doesn't have any slant so the food hangs in the back where my cat can't reach it. A slight slant would help make this a little better. I do use it a lot though, especially when I work long days or go on a day trip. I feel she knowing my cat will be fed.
customer_reviews.author: stryder

customer_reviews.title: Works as described! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This auto feeder is perfect! My cat used to wake me up at all times of the morning to try to have me feed her. After setting up this auto feeder, she hasn't bothered me since! She knows exactly what time it's about to dispense, she sits and waits for it every morning. Best part is she doesn't bother me at all anymore, she will eat and then come cuddle up nicely untill I wake up to go to work! Love this product! Would recommend to anyone and everyone who wants to auto feed their cat or small dog with feeding times up to 4 times a day!
customer_reviews.author: $AM

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer service. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: We have outside cats and keep our wopet in the covered porch. We can go traveling for a good week without worry. Battery backup is a good peice of mind when traveling too. You may want to strap it to the wall if outdoors...other critters like to try to get in. It survived a dual racoon attack so we strapped it to our wall after that. Our lid recently broke and they (wopet) replaced our unit quickly with excellent correspondence. Highest recommendation I've given on a product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Where is this product has been all my life !!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a busy person, so I cannot always feed my dog on time. This machine is like a god help. I could set up the meals for my dog up to 3 times a day, and according to your dog, you could adjust the amount of food. Besides, it has a hug capacity, so I could use it my dog food storage. The LCD is inside after you open the lift, so no worry about your dog playing with it. The best part I could record my voice whenever the dog is feeding. My voice made me scare sometimes tho. Best decision ever
customer_reviews.author: Mai Tran

customer_reviews.title: Cannot unlock and open with one hand
customer_reviews.text: Works great and good to be able to put turn it on if I'm going to be out for most of the day and still keep my cats on a schedule. The only thing I don't like is the unlocking mechanism. It's not bad, just not fully thought out. You have to push the button and lift at the same time, but when pushing the button it causes the entire unit to tilt back. So, you have to have one hand on the button, one hand on the back of the unit, and one hand free to lift up the lid. Not the most intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: KDong

customer_reviews.title: Works well without any fuss
customer_reviews.text: This has exceeded our expectations and has fed our cat without any issues. We have had it on the battery option (beginning of May until Aug.) with the same dollar store batteries running it and no sign of dying yet. We get x4 portioned meals a day that has been really consistent and even. The best part, our cat no longer whines at us to feed him because he has realized that we are not the feeders any longer. He recognizes the noise of it winding and knows it means food time.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase for over fed pets
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with the L (large portion) rotator attached. I find that this is fine for my cats since I can adjust the portion size. There is an exchangeable piece in the box for those who want the S (small portion) rotator. This machine does have an option to play a recording of your voice when it is time to dispense food, however, it is not very loud and not perfect clarity. The control buttons are not very sensitive, but the type of options available are very useful. So far I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Solid Feeder
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a few automated pet feeders and this has been the best so far. After reading the instructions the programming is not bad at all, but I would recommend reading it. There are no apps, but that can be a good thing with all the bad apps going around. The food drops are precise for the kibble we are using and there are plenty of options for changing portion sizes. From what I can tell there are only 3 meal times, but you get a wide range of options for the amount it drops during those meal times. The food seems pretty well sealed inside the unit and cleaning does not seem difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Mind

customer_reviews.title: So far this works really well. Ive only had ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this works really well. Ive only had it up and running for 3 days now. Penny isn't quite sure what to think of the noise as It releases food, and her skepticism has carried through all three days, but if the girl is hungry enough, she will eat. Going out of town for two weeks, and this is a huge relief knowing I don't have to put out a bunch of food out in hopes that her appetite will allow her to make it the entire two weeks. Its a little larger than I thought, but it holds quite a bit of food in the reservoir, so I'll take it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Expensive piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I had great hopes for this device in helping to keep local feral cats fed through the winter. Unfortunately the portion size was not adjustable as described in the instruction manual. It would only spit out a 1/8th cup portion and was not able to increase. Instruction book says it was “Designed by US”. Instructions were terrible. Too bad the manufacturer (like many) wouldn’t spend $100 to have the instructions written in proper English.
customer_reviews.author: K. Surber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: sometimes I take a short trip and I hated having to depend on someone to feed my cats. This feeder is absolutely wonderful! It is very easy to operate. I have 2 small cats and I saw feedback regarding difficulty changing to a small feeder, so I decided to test the large feeder. My cats eat IAMS so the nuggets are small. I first tried 1 portion and it was way too little for 2 cats. Two portions twice a day was perfect. I recommend testing the large feeder that comes already attached before you go through the trouble of changing to a small feeder.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: The cat now lets us sleep in...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had developed a habit of waking us up early, especially on weekends when we wanted to sleep in late, by meowing at our door. We bought this for him (for us) as a Christmas present. It took him a while to figure out the robot was responsible for feeding him, rather than us, but we are now able to sleep in. We haven't had any difficulties with it, and we've had it for about four months now. Money well spent, especially when we leave for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Blofeld

customer_reviews.title: allows me extra sleep time
customer_reviews.text: This automatic feeder works well and was easy to program. The bin is large. The locking cover is great, it has been knocked over once by our massive size cat and it did not open. Our two cats adapted well, they now stand in front of the feeder 10 minutes before it dispenses. The main idea for the purchase was finding a way to feed our cats while getting away on weekends this summer. I'm no longer awoken at 5 a.m. by 2 extremely loud whining "starving" cats.
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: Love it and so worth the extra sleep I get
customer_reviews.text: I have a diabetic cat who needs to be kept on a feeding/shot schedule. Unfortunately, this doesn't jibe with my "loves to sleep more than life itself" proclivity, so I bought this feeder so I can get my extra shuteye without having to wake up and feed my cat early in the morning. Had it probably a year now, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Farelenore

customer_reviews.title: Could use a portion chart
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful device. My cat has tried her best to get good out, even tipped it over, but the food stays inside and the lid is secure. One improvement would be to include a portion size chart. At present you have to guess how much food is released in each portion. If you had a scale I guess you could weigh it out. I was feeding my cat 3/4 cup of food per day in three 1/4 cup meals. I have no clue how to convert that amount now.
customer_reviews.author: lthornton79

customer_reviews.title: Confusing set up but WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn’t designed the best for easy set up but once you set it up, it’s perfect. Took me 3 different attempts to get the right food amount for our cat. The product uses something like 1 unit = 10 grams, which I’m not sure was super accurate. Do a trial run to make sure it produces the amount you want and you’ll be good. Plus, you can record a voice memo that plays when the food is distributed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little feeder
customer_reviews.text: We have four barn cats and were leaving town for 2 weeks. We got this little feeder to give them a meal a day because it's still harsh winter here. We tested it out and it works in sub zero in a shelter! The cats are currently clawing the front of it and it is sustaining little damage. We did have to surround it in cinder block to keep them from tipping it over. The recording helps them hear the food is dropping. Pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christmas shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit I originally gave this a 2 star review as there was a defect with the product. The customer service department contacted me several times to ensure I was satisfied and to fix it. WOPET is really big on making customers happy, which I find rare for amazon retailers. I have now recommended this product to several people given the company's excellent customer service and outreach. As far as the feeder is concerned, my cat loves it. My friend's dogs hate it as they can no longer raid the cat's food everytime they visit me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for us. The food coming out was loud enough hitting the plastic dish that the middle of the night feeding (one of the reasons we got it) woke us up. Also some of the food stayed right under the storage unit and my picky cat wouldn't stick her nose in the small space to get it. Oh well. Looked like a good unit otherwise. Edit: increased from 2 to 3 stars after some thought. Company tried very hard to address any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but loses settings during power outages.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week, worked as expected. The issue is my program and settings get lost when there is a power outage unless batteries are installed. I only use this while I’m traveling once every few months, I don’t want to keep the batteries in it in case the batteries drain out which could cause more damages. The unit should have used some money to keep the setting without requiring power and batteries. Also I wish it was 50% bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Chenggong Liu

customer_reviews.title: Has helped us portion our dogs food due to vet telling us she needed to go on a diet. Works well!
customer_reviews.text: We love this automatic feeder. Our dog gained too much weight and told us we had to put her on a diet. We both work all day so we normally just leave food out all day. We figured this would be the best way to rationalize her food. It helps with limiting her food and feeding her at certain times of the day. It’s easy to clean and we love the lock feature. It’s really nice not having to put food out everyday too since this feeder holds a good bit of food.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pettis

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Feeder
customer_reviews.text: I used another brand for four years until it stopped working. This product was so easy to setup. I really like the fact that it works with both batteries and electric. This is a much more reliable way to ensure that it will always be working. My only suggestion would be that more information is given as to the measurements that you use to program the amount of feed. I had to try several times until I finally found the correct number. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ESCFL

customer_reviews.title: Randomly clears your meal size settings - leaves pets hungry
customer_reviews.text: This is, of course, a super convenient product. However, 3 times in the past 6 months, this feeder has adjusted the meal size back to "1" for each meal without me even touching it. Each time, I have only noticed by the fact that it sounds slightly different when the food is dispensed (less food dropping), then I think "hmmm, my cat has been extra needy for attention lately." Then I put it together - oh, she's hungry. Overall decent product, but quite expensive for something that doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this automatic feeder. With a little playing around we were able to get the quantity exact, portion number two equals a 1/4 of a cup of cat food. The clock time is military 24 hour time so that wasn’t an issue since I know how to do that. I love the battery back up also. We taped a message which plays at each feeding. With this feeder we can now sleep in and our cat does not wake us up at the crack of dawn to feed her!
customer_reviews.author: Robin (FL, USA)

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: I have the most food oriented cat and I work crazy hours and this feeder has saved our relationship! He would start crying for food at 5 in the morning and be standing at the door crying as soon as I got home at night. This allows him to have a set breakfast and dinner with a small afternoon snack, and he has become much calmer about life. My cat is also the master of getting into containers and this one has miraculously managed to survive his attempts! The portion sizes are a little odd and it does take some experimentation to figure out how much to set it to. But overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think, just buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I got this on one of the deal of the day so it was a great price. We have two cats and I would feed them before and after work and they would only yowl at me, never my fiancé, to get fed. Now they know they get fed at the exact same times every day. I have the feeder set up for 7am 1pm and 7pm. I’ve had to adjust the portions quite a bit since I’ve set it up for three times a day but I would buy this again and again without remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved by Persnickety In-law
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my in-laws who have overweight cats they have sometime ago put on a feeding schedule -- specific amount at a specific time. My father-in-law is a persnickety guy so I was a bit apprehensive about getting anything really. Thank goodness for this automatic pet feeder. I am once again a "wonderful" daughter-in-law lol
customer_reviews.author: Deal Searcher

customer_reviews.title: SO GLAD I PURCHASED THIS
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Great for setting up times and food portions for your pet. It plugs in, and has battery backup. The mic for recording messages is unnecessary. I used it briefly. My cat is trained as soon as he hears the food hit the tray goes flying across the house to get his food. I've have use other products, this one is totally worth the cost and convenience. Make your life a little easier and worry free. Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great auto pet feeder
customer_reviews.text: We are traveling quite a bit and our finicky feline likes her dry food very fresh. This device delivers portion controlled meals as programmed so our finicky feline gets a fresh delivery a couple of times per day. The device was super simple to set up (Unlike the Orita which I also tried and returned), you can even record your voice if you like to call your pet to meal time. The device is stylish enough to be unobtrusive and very reliable. I highly recommend this feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Product Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Went on Vacation to Europe for three weeks and used the auto feeder. Our friends came over to fill the auto feed and auto water feeder twice a weeks. The Cats were still at home when we arrived from our vacation. I had another brand auto feeder before but this one is way better. Like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Cockroaches
customer_reviews.text: -It works well as an automatic feeder. -Holds a lot of food. -Lock feature is secure, but can be difficult/annoying to open. -My cat figured out that she can get some food to fall out by shaking the unit. -The unit isn't airtight and ended up becoming infested with cockroaches. Not only can they crawl up from the tray where food dispenses, there's also a tiny 2mm hole in the front of the unit where they would hide and grow. We washed the entire thing out and I put some tape over the hole, but I'm very reluctant to use kt again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this feeder for a couple of days now and have no complaints. I was a little nervous about ordering only one feeder as I have two adult cats who are used to eating out of separate bowls, however, they seem to have adjusted fairly well and the bowl on this feeder is big enough for them to both eat at the same time. It’s really nice that you can set up to four meals and adjust the portion sizes. So far I have not had any issues and it seems to be very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice feeder
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our 4 cats, for the purpose of feeding them while on an occasional trip, and also for their regular morning meal every day when we are home. It's easy to program, and works great. I'd say the only missing feature is the ability to set a meal size for manual feedings (each push of the Manual button dispenses just one unit, so we'd have to push it 4 times to get the correct amount of food).
customer_reviews.author: mcas

customer_reviews.title: My life is so much easier now! But with a flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to feed my cat small portions more often. My cat no longer begs me for food all day and yet has become a much healthier weight. He also throws up a lot less since his portions are small. All without me ever having to touch it! Update: 10 months later and my cat has figured out that if he hits the feeder some more food will fall out! Changing my review to 3 stars because this is a pretty significant flaw that my smart cat can exploit now.
customer_reviews.author: Crista

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but not for us
customer_reviews.text: I did return this product, not because it didn't function as advertised, but because the small amount we wanted to dispense for our overweight cat did not clear the overhang of the unit so it was hard for the cat to get to the cat food. Would be better with a removable stainless food bowl as you need to clean the bowl regularly. We found a unit that also offered additional bowls for purchase and as we needed 2 feeders, it fit our needs better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Changing to the smaller portion size requires removing 6 small screws and putting in the different 'kibble Turner's it came with. Was fatefully easy to do and the portions really are small! - about 4 grams or 11⁄2~2 teaspoons of the kibbles we use. Programming the feeding times is quite easy too. This can be done down to the minute, jumps of 15mins would probably have been easier, but it's better than only being able to set it on the hour like our old feeder. Although some things could be improved, mainly options for a 5th & 6th meal/snack would have been preferable, it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Dionysus

customer_reviews.title: Good feeder, bad bowl
customer_reviews.text: I like the computer on this feeder. It’s very simple to understand and remember without needing to use instructions every time. The bowl is too shallow and slippery. The food falls onto the bowl like a kids slide and some of it goes flying out onto the kitchen floor. Today a piece of food flew 2 feet past the feeder... also the bowl has flimsy attachment to the feeder which I worry would break. I really like that the feeder has transparent plastic so I can see the food level. Also I like the small feeder attachment which is a good size for a cat. Overall much better than my old feeder. Will update if this one breaks too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra Crossing

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get an automatic feeder so my dog would be able to eat dinner on days that I worked passed his dinnertime. I set up a doggy cam and sure enough it works! It dispenses the correct amount of food at the time you set it for and has been very consistent. My only issue is that it is very light weight and my 15 pound dog has found ways to push it over; once the top even popped open! I wish it was weighted down with something some my dog couldn't tip it over. He would just stare and paw at it. So unfortunately we are not using this right now.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Hafez

customer_reviews.title: A year later, stopped functioning correctly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this feeder about a year and a half ago. It worked great at first, but now, the timer isn’t working well and either skips meals, resets itself, or feeds at odd times. I’ve kept it clean and check often to be sure it’s not jammed with food. Our cat is driving us nuts because of the inconsistency. I’m so disappointed, as this thing is NOT cheap. Currently looking for another feeder. Can’t recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mama M

customer_reviews.title: Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. Especially if you have a large breed. The tray is not angled like other similar pet food dispensors. Kibble gets underneath the lip of the main unit and the dog has to work extra hard to get them from underneath. Look for the other similar pet food dispensers where the kibble tray slants down or it has a ramp for food to slide down so the dog can get to eat easier. Big head dogs are gonna get frustrated quick.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great automatic feeder
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love the battery back up especially since I have destructive kitties that chew through cords. It however is too lightweight even with food and the cats tip it over and then the food doesn’t come out. I got some steel wire and secured it to their cat tree. Now the little brats can’t tip it over. Only thing i wish it did was able to be controlled from my phone from an app or something. Otherwise the rest of the features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Confusing and difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had some difficulty putting together the smaller hopper for small animals. The instructions were poor and unclear. Portion size chart would have been helpful as I spent 35 minutes trying to figure out why manual mode was giving my cats literally like 10 kibbles. It's a bit better thana feeder I had before but like most auto feeders, the technology is clearly needing to be perfected.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great device, minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great feeder so far. Portion sizes are really small, so calibrate carefully before you leave your pet alone with it. I wish the tray was slanted so the food would fall away from the base of the device. We had to tilt the whole device so the cats could access the food easier. Otherwise this has been a life saver for feeding the cats while we're away.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaC

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grand-cat
customer_reviews.text: My son's cat is overweight and he was struggling to control his portion sizing. This eliminates the struggle and feeds the cat when they are at work or away. (side note: the cat is unhappy that he doesn't get as much food. I have seen several dirty look photos.)
customer_reviews.author: the25angel

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Works really well and it feels wonderful to go on a business trip and know that my cats are cared for and are receiving their food. For some reason after 8 months it started to malfunction. However, I contacted the company directly through their website and they were so helpful! They immediately sent out a new Wopet. Thank you for the great product and great customer service. :)
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pet feeder
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for our cats and works very well. We were hesitant to spend so much money, but this a great quality item and has lasted well for over year now. We really like that it holds so much food and the food containment area is air sealed. It typically lasts our cat about one month before needing to be refilled. We really like the consistency that it provides for our cats so that we can help to control their weight. It has battery and wall outlet power which is also really nice. the first one was so good we bought a second!
customer_reviews.author: James Verwilliams

customer_reviews.title: dead in a month...
customer_reviews.text: it worked fine for about a month. i tried to email the company and the emails came back undeliverable. i finally contacted them via facebook messenger (they have a FB page) but i'm waiting to see what they'll do. when it worked, it was pretty good. programming and portion control was good. it was a little noisy when it dispensed and removing the tray for cleaning was a little difficult.
customer_reviews.author: kenji s. aoki

customer_reviews.title: Works well but buttons hard to press
customer_reviews.text: I love pretty much everything about this, except the buttons are hard to press. It takes several attempts to get it to register. The other downside is the bowl itself is slippery, so my cat finds it hard to eat the food as it all slides to the back. She figures it out, though. I appreciate that even though my cat is very food motivated, she hasn't figured out how to cheat the system. It allows her to get more frequent, smaller meals so she isn't crying at our door in the early hours of the morning and we can leave for an evening and have peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

product_meta.title: WOPET Automatic Pet Feeder Food Dispenser for Cats and Dogs–Features: Distribution Alarms, Portion Control, Voice Recorder, Programmable Timer for up to 4 Meals per Day
feature_bullets: FEED YOUR PET WHILE YOU’RE AWAY - Schedule up to 4 automated feedings per day using the built-in programmable timer. Program each meal time with a few button clicks on an easy to use LCD screen. Control food portions from 2 teaspoons to 4.5 cups per feeding. NEVER MISS A FEEDING. The WOpet feeder is wall powered and/or battery powered. In case of a power outage, the feeder will continue to function on 3 D-size batteries to assure your pet gets fed (batteries not included).

CONTROL PORTION SIZE OF EACH FEEDING - Dispense anywhere from 2 teaspoons to 4.5 cups dry food per feeding to sustain any size animal. You can program a unique portion size for each automatic feeding, allowing you to ESTABLISH REGULAR EATING ROUTINES throughout the day without any stress.

RECORD A CUSTOM MESSAGE FOR YOUR PET - Keep your pet excited about meal times! Press and hold the mic button for three seconds to begin recording a message to be played as each feeding dispenses. (e.g. Here, Fido! Come and eat, boy! Good doggy.)

OPERATING TIPS - Suitable for dry food only, with the food pellet size ranging from 0.2-0.6 inches in diameter; up to 4 meals a day. The removable hygienic feeding tray is dishwasher safe and easy to clean. LARGE STORAGE COMPARTMENT - The main food storage compartment can hold up to 20 CUPS of food and is removable for easy cleaning and refilling.

CUSTOMER SERVICE - Customizable Feeder Great for Dogs, Cats and Small Animals of Various Sizes.Provide a interesting living for your pet with our WOPET pet feeder!24-hour professional service center and 365 day technical support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,610 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: WOPET Automatic Pet Feeder Food Dispenser
